configToArgs

public String[] configToArgs(String filePath)
                      throws SecurityException,
                             IllegalArgumentException,
                             ParserConfigurationException,
                             SAXException,
                             IOException
Converts the contents of a config file to commandline arguments

Parameters:
filePath - path to the config file
Returns:
equivalent commandline argument array
Throws:
SecurityException - violates security manager
IllegalArgumentException - illegal arguments for method
IOException - error reading config file
SAXException - xml parse error
ParserConfigurationException - parser config error

Parses a configuration file describing a Task

Parameters:
filename - the name of the file to parse
Returns:
the Task described by the config file
Throws:
IOException - xml parsing error
SAXException - xml parsing error
ParserConfigurationException - xml parsing error
